page.title: 05Cabus Road Network Tourism
page.content: The A6 trunk road carries heavy traffic despite the M6 by-passing us.Loops of former road left as lay-byes are used for rest periods by drivers.Travellers are catered for by the Hamilton Arms restaurant,Little Chef cafe and garage facilities.Four caravan sites are popular because they are central to Morecambe,Blackpool,the Lakes and the Yorkshire Dales with nearby river and canal for outdoor pursuits.Gubberford Lane runs east through Scorton to the Trough of Bowland.Other minor roads go to Winmarleigh and Cockerham.The A6 has a half hourly bus-service alternately Morecambe-Preston and Morecambe-Blackpool.Scorton has 2 buses on Thursday and Winmarleigh 3 on Thursday and Saturday and special services carry schoolchildren to Garstang.
